# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/text-buffer`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for text-buffer (https://github.com/atom/text-buffer).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/types-2.0/text-buffer
